Although I do like paragraph breaks, I didn't find it necessary to have them in my story. The events happening in the Demacian library are what Ezreal's thinking of at the moment, and they shouldn't really be seen as jumps.  Thanks for the suggestion though.

I am well aware that the Freljord is in the north, and Mount Targon is in the south. Unfortunately the 1.5k word limit makes it difficult to include all those little details.

Despite Taric's changed lines, his old joke is so famous I decided to use that instead.
